scripts.release:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --bundle-output index.ios.bundle --dev false && hermes-osx/hermesc -emit-binary -out index.ios.bundle.hbc index.ios.bundle && rm -f index.ios.bundle && mv index.ios.bundle.hbc index.ios.bundle
scripts.release:android: react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output index.android.bundle --dev false && hermes-osx/hermesc -emit-binary -out index.android.bundle.hbc index.android.bundle && rm -f index.android.bundle && mv index.android.bundle.hbc index.android.bundle
